name: The Forest Dungeon Prototype
description:
This is a Prototype for the game i am creating, with RPG and Dungeon Crawling elements.

There is no death for the player yet... so 0 Deaths.

there is no NPC interaction, except  when it comes to killing the enemy.

WASD to move,

Left-Click to Attack,

ESC to Exit.

Looking forward to hear your opinions.

Enjoy
